author: niallp
msg: Minor fixes to the Valdiator 1.3.1 release following feedback from Craig McClanahan and Rahul Akolkar
- add note to the release notes about Jakarta ORO now being marked as optional
- Fix the API version in the menu bar (from 1.0.4 to 1.0.2)
- Switch test coverage plugin from cobertura (which requires JDK 1.4) to jcoverage (which runs on JDK 1.3)

author: ngn
msg: Applying patch for bug where the incorrect IP is returned when a server has multiple NICs and the client issues a PASV command. Thanks to Joseph Ferner for finding the bug and providing the patch. (FTPSERVER-51)
Also adding a test case to reproduce the bug. The patch fixes makes the test case succeed.

about the change. Also removed information about the Incubator Release from
